mapper.sql: id, lang_code, resource_key, resource_value, module_code, create_user_id, modify_user_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
insert into s_i18n_resource (lang_code, resource_key, resource_value, module_code, create_user_id, modify_user_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values
(#{item.langCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resourceKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resourceValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
